channel.title: Need help on editing rsps java files
channel.description:
Hey, I am editing a source and fixing all bugs etc. but where it says "add this method" and "add this void" I am unsure where to put the code (this is refering to client.java) Any tutorials about editing java files on rsps's. Like where I should paste the code in the file etc haha. Hard to explain but I hope I explained it well enough.
MY EXAMPLE I am editing client.java. I need to add a method and a void. Where inside client.java should it go? is it like php/html and will not work if i put it in the wrong place?
Hope that makes sense. :)

item.title: Need help on editing rsps java files
item.dc:creator: @Nebulae Nebulae
item.description:
@Nebulae wrote:

It can go anywhere so long as it’s outside of any existing method (i.e. between the first { and the last }), but inside the class (i.e. public class Client {)

Basically you can put it anywhere, it doesn’t matter. Just make sure you add it at the bottom of an existing method but inside the actual class { and }.

Example:

public class Example {
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        doShitHere();
    }

//... add your new methods here

    public void randomMethod() {
        int someting = 0;

        if (something == 0) {
            doSomethingElse();
        }
    }

//... add another new method here

}

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on editing rsps java files
